title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram with Kempu Stone Pendant
materials: Green Onyx Accent. Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for unparalleled luster.
features: This Kasula Haaram showcases a meticulously crafted pendant featuring a traditional floral motif design encrusted with brilliant CZ stones and a central kempu stone. The necklace is adorned with graduated rows of CZ stones interspersed with vibrant coral beads (ప్రవాళం పూసలు). Delicate gold ball drops (గుండ్ల పేరు) add a touch of traditional elegance. The intricate craftsmanship is a testament to the skilled artisans of Hyderabad.
occasions: or any special celebration. This statement piece will enhance your presence at any grand event.
description: This exquisite Kasula Haaram blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary elegance. The use of natural corals and Kempu stones adds a touch of authenticity and cultural significance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, making it a valuable investment. It symbolizes prosperity and auspicious beginnings, perfect for heirloom status.
